# GitHub Workflows

Automated workflows for repository maintenance and community management.

## Planned Workflows

| Workflow | Description | Issue | Status |
|----------|-------------|-------|--------|
| Issue Triage | Auto-label and deduplicate community issues | [#18](https://github.com/Z-M-Huang/vcp/issues/18) | Planned |

Workflow development begins in Phase 6 after core standards, skills, and hooks are established.
